column1: Kata Robata////- Miso Crusted Bone Marrow ($14) - dijon mustard seeds
column5: bonito flakes. This is beef bone marrow. It was so tasty. We put the marrow on the bread and drizzled with sea salt
column6: the mustard seeds. FATTY goodness. We were so glad we ordered this
column7: since we definitely won't find this elsewhere. It might be an acquired taste though for some people.
